title: Ghost Games
body:
Hey,

So, I was minding my business playing LoL. I finish a game and go to start another one. The game glitches out and I'm unable to play any games from then up until now. I've already contacted support about this. I was just wondering if anyone has done something to fix the problem of 'Ghost Games'. And no, waiting does not work.

replies.body:
If it's a true ghost game, they resolve themselves in about 4 hours at absolute most.

If it's talking longer than that, it's probably not a ghost game (or at least not just a ghost game) and ticketing support is the way to go.
